description: The Tenth Edition of Human Resource Management continues to present both the theoretical and practical aspects of HRM. The theoretical material is presented throughout the textbook and highlighted via a marginal glossary. The practical aspects of HRM are presented through lively and pedagogically-effective examples woven throughout the text and in the end-of-chapter materials. This edition reflects the challenges of diversity, technology and globalization in the business world and how these forces impact the HRM function within organizations.
title: Human Resource Management
